question: Will Omar Apollo win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist?
reasoning:
Based on the gathered information, here are the key points relevant to the question of whether Omar Apollo will win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist:

1. **Nomination**: Omar Apollo is nominated for the Outstanding Music Artist category at the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards for his work "God Said No". This indicates that he is considered a strong contender.

2. **Competition**: Other nominees in the same category include notable artists such as Adam Lambert, Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, Joy Oladokun, Kali Uchis, Orville Peck, Tove Lo, and Victoria Monét. This suggests a highly competitive field with several well-known and influential artists.

3. **Evaluation Criteria**: The GLAAD Media Awards evaluate nominees based on fair, accurate, and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ community, boldness and originality, cultural impact, and overall quality. These criteria will play a crucial role in determining the winner.

4. **Significant Competitors**: Doechii, one of the nominees, has been named Billboard's Woman of the Year for 2025 and has received a Grammy award for her mixtape "Alligator Bites Never Heal". This recognition may enhance her chances of winning the award.

5. **Award Ceremony**: The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards will take place on March 27, 2025, in Los Angeles, where the winner will be announced.

Given the competitive nature of the category and the presence of other highly acclaimed artists, the probability of Omar Apollo winning the award is influenced by both his artistic contributions and the strength of his competitors.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.15

# GLAAD ANNOUNCES NOMINEES FOR THE 36th ANNUAL GLAAD MEDIA AWARDS

**January 22, 2025**

The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards announced 303 nominees across 33 categories including culture-shifting stories about transgender people, people living with HIV, global LGBTQ criminalization, LGBTQ asylum seekers, LGBTQ youth, and more

LGBTQ stories and creatives across entertainment take center stage with nominees including: “Abbott Elementary,” “Agatha All Along,” “Baby Reindeer,” Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, “Lil Nas X: Long Live Montero,” “My Old Ass,” “RuPaul’s Drag Race,” “Sesame Street,” “Southern Charm,” “The Umbrella Academy,” “Will & Harper,” and “Wicked”

Additional nominees include: The 77th Tony Awards, The 98th Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade, “Brilliant Minds,” Cosmopolitan, “Fancy Dance,” “Fantasmas,” “The Kelly Clarkson Show,” “Land of Women,” Michaela Jae, “Palm Royale,” “Primer Impacto,” “The Real Housewives of New York City,”

Victoria Monét, “The View,” and Vogue

In Journalism, local news soars with coverage from Columbus, San Francisco, Spokane, Tulsa and more nominated alongside powerhouse storytelling from The Advocate, Bloomberg TV, CNBC.com, ESPN, MSNBC, The New Yorker, PBS, Telemundo, as GLAAD celebrates newly-expanded category honoring Outstanding Independent Journalism

GLAAD also announced Special Recognition honors for “DRAG: The Musical,” “Red Ink: A Tribute to Cecilia Gentili,” The Stonewall National Monument Visitor Center, OUTLOUD, Q.Digital, and WNBA 2024 Champions, The New York Liberty

The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards are presented by official sponsors, Delta Air Lines and Hornitos, taking place in Los Angeles on March 27, 2025

Billie Eilish, HIT ME HARD AND SOFT (Darkroom/Interscope)

Below is the full list of nominees for the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards. title: Doechii, Durand Bernarr, Maren Morris & More Set to Attend the 2025 GLAAD Media Awards
author: Stephen Daw
url: https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/doechii-durand-bernarr-attend-2025-glaad-media-awards-1235921113/
hostname: billboard.com
description: Doechii, Durand Bernarr and more stars were announced as attendees at the upcoming 2025 GLAAD Media Awards. Check out the guestlist.

categories: ['Pride']
tags: ['Awards, Music News, pride']

With the United States government repeatedly failing to protect the rights of LGBTQ+ people — and more specifically, transgender people — everywhere, a star-studded group of performers is coming together to celebrate queer excellence in defiance of the systems of oppression surrounding them.

On Thursday (March 13), LGBTQ+ non-profit organization GLAAD announced the list of attendees, including presenters and performers, for the 2025 GLAAD Media [Awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/awards/). The event — which is set to take place on Thursday, March 27, in Los Angeles — will feature guests including [Doechii](https://billboard.com/artist/doechii), [Durand Bernarr](https://billboard.com/artist/durand-bernarr), Maren Morris, Keke Palmer, Hannah Einbinder, Joe Locke and cast members from *RuPaul’s Drag Race*, among others.

Along with attending the annual awards show, Bernarr is also set to serve as the musical guest at the official afterparty for the awards ceremony. The R&B star, who recently released his latest studio album *Bloom*, is also nominated at the ceremony for outstanding breakthrough music artist.

### Trending on Billboard

Doechii — who has been named *Billboard*‘s [Woman of the Year](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-billboard-woman-of-the-year-2025-1235918168/) for 2025 — is also a nominee at the annual ceremony in the category of outstanding music artist for her work on *Alligator Bites Never Heal*, her Grammy award-winning mixtape released last year. In accepting the Grammy for best rap album in February, the “Anxiety” rapper [sent a message](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-grammy-best-rap-album-2025-1235890408/) to Black girls watching at home: “I want to tell you that you can do it. Anything is possible,” she said. Don’t allow anybody to project any stereotypes onto you … you are exactly who you need to be to where you are, and I am a testimony [to that].”

---
title: Doechii, Durand Bernarr, Maren Morris & More Set to Attend the 2025 GLAAD Media Awards
author: Stephen Daw
url: https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/doechii-durand-bernarr-attend-2025-glaad-media-awards-1235921113/
hostname: billboard.com
description: Doechii, Durand Bernarr and more stars were announced as attendees at the upcoming 2025 GLAAD Media Awards. Check out the guestlist.
sitename: Billboard
date: 2025-03-13
categories: ['Pride']
tags: ['Awards, Music News, pride']
---
With the United States government repeatedly failing to protect the rights of LGBTQ+ people — and more specifically, transgender people — everywhere, a star-studded group of performers is coming together to celebrate queer excellence in defiance of the systems of oppression surrounding them.

On Thursday (March 13), LGBTQ+ non-profit organization GLAAD announced the list of attendees, including presenters and performers, for the 2025 GLAAD Media [Awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/awards/). The event — which is set to take place on Thursday, March 27, in Los Angeles — will feature guests including [Doechii](https://billboard.com/artist/doechii), [Durand Bernarr](https://billboard.com/artist/durand-bernarr), Maren Morris, Keke Palmer, Hannah Einbinder, Joe Locke and cast members from *RuPaul’s Drag Race*, among others.

Along with attending the annual awards show, Bernarr is also set to serve as the musical guest at the official afterparty for the awards ceremony. The R&B star, who recently released his latest studio album *Bloom*, is also nominated at the ceremony for outstanding breakthrough music artist.

### Trending on Billboard

Doechii — who has been named *Billboard*‘s [Woman of the Year](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-billboard-woman-of-the-year-2025-1235918168/) for 2025 — is also a nominee at the annual ceremony in the category of outstanding music artist for her work on *Alligator Bites Never Heal*, her Grammy award-winning mixtape released last year. In accepting the Grammy for best rap album in February, the “Anxiety” rapper [sent a message](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-grammy-best-rap-album-2025-1235890408/) to Black girls watching at home: “I want to tell you that you can do it. Anything is possible,” she said. Don’t allow anybody to project any stereotypes onto you … you are exactly who you need to be to where you are, and I am a testimony [to that].”

Elsewhere at the GLAAD Awards, *Wicked* star Cynthia Erivo is [set…

# GLAAD ANNOUNCES NOMINEES FOR THE 36th ANNUAL GLAAD MEDIA AWARDS

**January 22, 2025**

The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards announced 303 nominees across 33 categories including culture-shifting stories about transgender people, people living with HIV, global LGBTQ criminalization, LGBTQ asylum seekers, LGBTQ youth, and more

LGBTQ stories and creatives across entertainment take center stage with nominees including: “Abbott Elementary,” “Agatha All Along,” “Baby Reindeer,” Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, “Lil Nas X: Long Live Montero,” “My Old Ass,” “RuPaul’s Drag Race,” “Sesame Street,” “Southern Charm,” “The Umbrella Academy,” “Will & Harper,” and “Wicked”

Additional nominees include: The 77th Tony Awards, The 98th Macy’s Thanksgiving Day Parade, “Brilliant Minds,” Cosmopolitan, “Fancy Dance,” “Fantasmas,” “The Kelly Clarkson Show,” “Land of Women,” Michaela Jae, “Palm Royale,” “Primer Impacto,” “The Real Housewives of New York City,”

Victoria Monét, “The View,” and Vogue

In Journalism, local news soars with coverage from Columbus, San Francisco, Spokane, Tulsa and more nominated alongside powerhouse storytelling from The Advocate, Bloomberg TV, CNBC.com, ESPN, MSNBC, The New Yorker, PBS, Telemundo, as GLAAD celebrates newly-expanded category honoring Outstanding Independent Journalism

GLAAD also announced Special Recognition honors for “DRAG: The Musical,” “Red Ink: A Tribute to Cecilia Gentili,” The Stonewall National Monument Visitor Center, OUTLOUD, Q.Digital, and WNBA 2024 Champions, The New York Liberty

The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards are presented by official sponsors, Delta Air Lines and Hornitos, taking place in Los Angeles on March 27, 2025

Outstanding Music Artist

Adam Lambert, AFTERS (More is More)

Billie Eilish, HIT ME HARD AND SOFT (Darkroom/Interscope)

Doechii, Alligator Bites Never Heal (Top Dawg Entertainment/Capitol Records)

Elton John, Never Too Late: Soundtrack to the Disn…

# 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards Nominees

The GLAAD Media Awards recognize and honor media for their fair, accurate and inclusive representations of the lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender and queer (LGBTQ) community and the issues that affect their lives.

Below is the full list of nominees for the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards. A tip sheet with a breakdown of nominations by media and trends among the nominees is available at [this link](https://glaad.org/releases/tip-sheet-diversity-facts-and-figures-for-the-36th-glaad-media-awards-nominees/). If you would like to attend the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards, [click here](https://glaad.org/mediaawards/36/tickets/) to learn more.

**NOMINEES FOR THE 36TH ANNUAL GLAAD MEDIA AWARDS**

**Outstanding Film – Wide Theatrical Release**

*Cuckoo*(Neon)*Drive-Away Dolls*(Focus Features)*Love Lies Bleeding*(A24)*Mean Girls*(Paramount Pictures)*My Old Ass*(Amazon MGM Studios)*Problemista*(A24)*Queer*(A24)*Wicked*(Universal Pictures)

**Outstanding New Series**

**Outstanding Film – Streaming Or TV**

*Am I Ok?*(Max)*Fancy Dance*(Apple TV+)*Good Grief*(Netflix)*The Groomsmen: Second Chances*(Hallmark)*The Holiday Exchange*(Amazon Prime Video / Peacock)*Mother of the Bride*(Netflix)*Ricky Stanicky*(Amazon Prime Video)*Season’s Greetings from Cherry Lane*(Hallmark)*Sweethearts*(Max)*Wynonna Earp: Vengeance*(Tubi)

**Outstanding Documentary**

{"url": "https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/doechii-durand-bernarr-attend-2025-glaad-media-awards-1235921113/", "snippet": "---
title: Doechii, Durand Bernarr, Maren Morris & More Set to Attend the 2025 GLAAD Media Awards
author: Stephen Daw
url: https://www.billboard.com/culture/pride/doechii-durand-bernarr-attend-2025-glaad-media-awards-1235921113/
hostname: billboard.com
description: Doechii, Durand Bernarr and more stars were announced as attendees at the upcoming 2025 GLAAD Media Awards. Check out the guestlist.
sitename: Billboard
date: 2025-03-13
categories: ['Pride']
tags: ['Awards, Music News, pride']
---
With the United States government repeatedly failing to protect the rights of LGBTQ+ people — and more specifically, transgender people — everywhere, a star-studded group of performers is coming together to celebrate queer excellence in defiance of the systems of oppression surrounding them.

On Thursday (March 13), LGBTQ+ non-profit organization GLAAD announced the list of attendees, including presenters and performers, for the 2025 GLAAD Media [Awards](https://www.billboard.com/t/awards/). The event — which is set to take place on Thursday, March 27, in Los Angeles — will feature guests including [Doechii](https://billboard.com/artist/doechii), [Durand Bernarr](https://billboard.com/artist/durand-bernarr), Maren Morris, Keke Palmer, Hannah Einbinder, Joe Locke and cast members from *RuPaul’s Drag Race*, among others.

Along with attending the annual awards show, Bernarr is also set to serve as the musical guest at the official afterparty for the awards ceremony. The R&B star, who recently released his latest studio album *Bloom*, is also nominated at the ceremony for outstanding breakthrough music artist.

### Trending on Billboard

Doechii — who has been named *Billboard*‘s [Woman of the Year](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-billboard-woman-of-the-year-2025-1235918168/) for 2025 — is also a nominee at the annual ceremony in the category of outstanding music artist for her work on *Alligator Bites Never Heal*, her Grammy award-winning mixtape released last year. In accepting the Grammy for best rap album in February, the “Anxiety” rapper [sent a message](https://www.billboard.com/music/awards/doechii-grammy-best-rap-album-2025-1235890408/) to Black girls watching at home: “I want to tell you that you can do it. Anything is possible,” she said. Don’t allow anybody to project any stereotypes onto you … you are exactly who you need to be to where you are, and I am a testimony [to that].”

Elsewhere at the GLAAD Awards, *Wicked* star Cynthia Erivo is [set…

messages.content:
Based on the gathered information, here are the key points relevant to the question of whether Omar Apollo will win the 2025 GLAAD Media Award for Outstanding Music Artist:

1. **Nomination**: Omar Apollo is nominated for the Outstanding Music Artist category at the 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards for his work "God Said No". This indicates that he is considered a strong contender.

2. **Competition**: Other nominees in the same category include notable artists such as Adam Lambert, Billie Eilish, Doechii, Elton John, Joy Oladokun, Kali Uchis, Orville Peck, Tove Lo, and Victoria Monét. This suggests a highly competitive field with several well-known and influential artists.

3. **Evaluation Criteria**: The GLAAD Media Awards evaluate nominees based on fair, accurate, and inclusive representations of the LGBTQ community, boldness and originality, cultural impact, and overall quality. These criteria will play a crucial role in determining the winner.

4. **Significant Competitors**: Doechii, one of the nominees, has been named Billboard's Woman of the Year for 2025 and has received a Grammy award for her mixtape "Alligator Bites Never Heal". This recognition may enhance her chances of winning the award.

5. **Award Ceremony**: The 36th Annual GLAAD Media Awards will take place on March 27, 2025, in Los Angeles, where the winner will be announced.

Given the competitive nature of the category and the presence of other highly acclaimed artists, the probability of Omar Apollo winning the award is influenced by both his artistic contributions and the strength of his competitors.

FINAL PROBABILITY: 0.15
